title: Gold 4 ADC/Jungle Main Looking to join Team and Grind Together to Improve
body: Looking to join a team. Very dedicated and willing to learn.

replies.body: It's great that you're looking for some teammates to help complete the VS missions, but you'll probably be able to find more people to play with if you look over in [**Player Recruitment**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment)!
